full_summary:
TSPS Solutions: Development of Business Cases
================================================ PompeoIntroduction

The National Research Council (NRC) is seeking senior-level professional business services for the design, planning, and development of business cases to support the creation and implementation of alternative organizational models.

**Closing Dates**
----------------

*   The deadline to submit proposals is February 13, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST.

**Publication Details**
----------------------

*   **Sollicitation Number:** 22-58121
*   **Reference Number:** PW-23-01022307
*   **Amendment Number** : 3

**Additional Information**
------------------------

*   The contracted professional services are required for a period of 5 months (February 2023 to June 2024).
*   The business cases will be used to consult both internal and external stakeholders, seek funding support and delegated authorities, and inform the strategic plans and priorities of the research centers.

**Notice and Attachments**
---------------------------

*   The notice (Request for Proposal) and attachments (including clarifications, Intellectual Property, Privacy and conditions) are available on [Canada.ca](https://www.canada.ca/fr/agence-authentification-document/demandes-de-propriete.html).

**Service Delivery**
-------------------

Services are required to be delivered in Ontario (outside of the National Capital Region).

**Training and Certification**
---------------------------

 The use of the following agreements are requested: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

This is to inform that the services have ended

------------------

- Description of the request:
The National Research Council (NRC) established that the purpose of this contract is to develop a business case for the redesign of its Research Institutes, consistent with the predetermined approach of the NRC's Program Priorities and Treasury Board Priorities for 2023-
